mapper.insert: insert into oa_client (CLIID, CLINAME, CLISEX, CLIUSERNAME, CLIPASSWORD, CLIADDRESS) VALUES (#{cliid},#{cliname},#{clisex},#{cliusername},#{clipassword},#{cliaddress})
mapper.update: update oa_client set CLINAME = #{cliname},CLISEX=#{clisex}, CLIUSERNAME = #{cliusername}, CLIPASSWORD = #{clipassword}, CLIADDRESS=#{cliaddress} where CLIID = #{cliid}
mapper.select: select cli.*,ca.CACOUNT, go.* from oa_client cli left outer join oa_cart ca on cli.CLIID=ca.CLIID left outer join oa_goods go on ca.GOID=go.GOID
select cli.*,ca.CACOUNT, go.* from oa_client cli left outer join oa_cart ca on cli.CLIID=ca.CLIID left outer join oa_goods go on ca.GOID=go.GOID limit #{start}, #{rows}
select count(*) from oa_client cli left outer join oa_cart ca on cli.CLIID=ca.CLIID left outer join oa_goods go on ca.GOID=go.GOID
select * from oa_goods where GOID in(select GOID from oa_cart where CLIID = #{cliid})
